message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Albert Schweitzer

message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

message: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese Proverb

message: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

message: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

message: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

message: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

message: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

message: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

message: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

message: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
author: Helen Keller

message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

message: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

message: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
author: Chris Grosser

message: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

message: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

message: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

message: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
author: George S. Patton

message: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

message: The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting.
author: Walt Disney

message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

message: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

message: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

message: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

message: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

message: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
author: Thomas A. Edison

message: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

message: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

message: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
author: Rob Siltanen

message: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

message: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh

message: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

message: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

message: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

message: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

message: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

message: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

message: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison
